net.xeoh.plugins.base.Plugin

    Package Description
    net.xeoh.plugins.base
    Contains the core plugin manager classes.
    net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.getplugin

    net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker
    Top level package for the information broker.

    • Uses of Plugin in net.xeoh.plugins.base

      Subinterfaces of Plugin in net.xeoh.plugins.base 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PluginConfiguration
      Gives you access to configuration items of plugins.
      interface  PluginInformation
      Returns various information about plugins, static as well as dynamic.
      interface  PluginManager
      This is your entry point to and the heart of JSPF.
